Tool

NameExport Table
ID13
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2013

Description

Exports a table to a PostgreSQL database.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Table Table (input)TABLE
Options
HostTextPG_HOSTPassword
PortIntegerPG_PORTMinimum: 0 Default: 5432
DatabaseTextPG_NAMEDatabase Name
UserTextPG_USERUser Name
PasswordTextPG_PWDPassword
Primary KeyTable fieldsTABLE_PK
Not NullTable fieldsTABLE_NN
UniqueTable fieldsTABLE_UQ
Table NameTextNAME
If table exists...ChoiceEXISTSAvailable Choices: [0] abort export [1] replace existing table [2] append records, if table structure allows Default: 0
